de.lwerner.flink.percentiles

Class AbstractSelectionProblem

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lwerner.flink.percentiles.AbstractAlgorithm
      • de.lwerner.flink.percentiles.AbstractSelectionProblem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Solvable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SelectionProblem, SetReductionMultiSelectionProblem, SimultaneousSelectionProblem

    public abstract class AbstractSelectionProblem
extends AbstractAlgorithm
    Abstract class for generalizing all the repeated work.
    Author:
    Lukas Werner

        public static <T extends AbstractSelectionProblem> T factory(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                             org.apache.flink.api.java.utils.ParameterTool params,

                                                      throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                             java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                             java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                             java.lang.InstantiationException
        Factory method for creating the correct algorithm class
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the class to instantiate
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to initiate
        params - the param tool
        k - the k values
        Returns:
        the algorithm class object - can execute solve()
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the constructor wasn't found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if we cannot access the constructor
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the target isn't able to be invoked
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if we couldn't instantiate
